items.text: length ball just outside off. Punched off the back foot to cover
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Sharma, no run

items.text: length ball on off stump, and nonchalantly punched off the back foot to long off
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Sharma, 1 run

items.text: full just outside off, and pushed off the front foot to long off for another easy single
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Karthik, 1 run

items.preText: Ishan Jain: "@Vulcan - I think any act of celebration done in the face of the opponent player is disrespectful. If it's done in any random direction towards the audience then it's ok. Dhawan never does it in the face of batsmen and he always does it with a big smile, a lot of times BAN players do it in the face of the players with a lot of aggression, that's why it has looked ugly for the most part." -- just to add my bit here. Tonight's celebration wasn't aggressive. It almost seemed like an in-joke between Nazmul and his team-mates. Lets end this discussion here please.
items.text: full just outside off, and he smothers a cover drive straight to the fielder
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Sharma, no run

items.text: good length angling into his pads. Worked off his hips to the sweeper-fielder on the leg side
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Sharma, 1 run

items.text: full ball on off stump. Angling into Rohit as he whips this off his feet to the leg side. Trickles away to midwicket
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Sharma, no run

items.text: good length outside off stump. Tailing in slightly and that's been exquisitely punched through the infield for four! Bring on the action replay.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Sharma, FOUR runs

items.text: length ball just outside off, and Rohit steers this off the back foot to third man for a jogging single
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Sharma, 1 run

items.text: back of a length outside off, and DK lets the ball come onto him. Tries to dab a shot past the slip fielder, but Mehidy's full-stretched dive ensures India can't pinch the single
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Karthik, no run

items.text: length ball just outside off, but tailing into DK's body. Looks to work it away off his hips, but misses. Hits his back leg and almost rolls onto the stumps
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Karthik, no run

items.text: back of a length outside off, DK looks to whip it square off the back foot, but the ball hits his hip
items.postText: Time for a change in commentary. Here's Varun after his well deserved dinner break.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Karthik, no run

items.preText: Hello all. What have you been eating?
items.text: short and wide outside off, left alone
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Sharma, no run

items.text: short of a length on off stump, defended on the back foot
items.postText: Ahmed: "welcome Varun- with your arrival, I'm hoping for Rohit's wicket and plus 1 :)" --- I can maybe get you Rohit, but don't pin your dating life on me
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Sharma, no run

items.text: full on leg stump, flicked straight to mid-on
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Sharma, no run

items.text: length on off stump, defended solidly off the front foot
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Sharma, no run

items.text: short of a length just outside off, looks to drop it into the covers, but he can't get it wide enough of the bowler
items.postText: Arpit@9: "Hello all. What have you been eating?....bit of nails at this time.."
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Sharma, no run

items.text: short of a length outside off, opens the face and runs this wide of third man
items.postText: Ninad : "Pappadam dipped in mango pulp, snack of a champion"
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Sharma, 1 run

items.preText: santosh battula: "@Varun: We've been eating our hearts out at the dismissals of Dhawan & Rayudu"
items.text: length on middle stump and straightening a touch. Defended watchfully off the outside half
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Sharma, no run

items.text: short of a length on middle stump, tucked to deep square's left off the back foot
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Sharma, 1 run

items.preText: Jigar Panchal: "Rotating strike is of top importance now. Rohit and Dinesh shouldn't get tied up too much. 4-5 runs in an over for another 10 overs without loosing any wicket will bring India in driving seat"
items.text: short of a length wide outside off, walks down at it but is forced to leave late as it jags away
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Karthik, no run

items.text: length ball just outside off, opens the face and drives to point's right
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Karthik, no run

items.text: length ball straightening in the channel. Thick outside edge to third man...who feels the need to throw at the stumps after the run is completed. He hits it too, but the deflection gives India an extra run
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Karthik, 2 runs

items.text: short and just outside off, a glorious whippy cut to point's left, but third man is very wide and keeps it to two
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Karthik, 2 runs

items.text: length on off stump, defended solidly on the front foot
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Sharma, no run

items.text: slower ball on a length, cutting into Rohit who can't get bat on the flick. Bit of an appeal for lbw, but he's safe
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Sharma, 1 leg bye
